releaseNotes: Please update the app in order to start enjoying the content!
- Added Watch History - You can now check your previously watched content history now
- Added Resume playback - You can now resume where you've left any movie/episode
- Added Quality selector - You can choose quality of specific movies/shows now.
- Added Dual Audio - You can now choose the audio for specific movies/shows.
- Added Hard coded subtitles - You can now either switch between the subtitles provided within the server or completely toggle them off.
- Added Missing release dates for related movies/shows.
- Added Recently watched history in homescreen it'll automatically show after you watch and exit the movie/show.
- Added New UI for Episodes & Season's for better convenience.
- Added Offline Automatic Backup for your watched content and player timestamp in case you uninstall app and install again mistakenly.
- Updated Improved Chromecast and fixed crashes on some devices.
- Updated New Downloder to ensure everything downloads and content will now show in your favourite thrid party video players like MX Player after download.
- Updated We've re-written the network part of the code so everything should load faster and smother than ever.
- Updated Fixed buffering issue for several movies/shows.
- This is a Major Release for Entire Channel Log Visit Our TG Channel.
